comment: He is a newer professor as of the time of this post and he is doing well. His lectures are easy to follow and understand, and practicing homework problems is the best way to improve. He will also do group exercises and engages with the class during lectures.

Has informational power points and his lectures are helpful in understanding some of the concepts and theories of the material but besides that, it's highly recommended you receive tutoring and read the textbook for yourself if you take this class.
